project_abstract.cdata: The Third Small Scale Enterprise Credit Project will continue the initiatives begun under the prior two Small Scale Enterprise (SSE) projects. Its objectives will be to: (i) relieve the scarcity of term financing on reasonable terms to strengthen, expand, diversify, and modernize existing SSE's; (ii) provide medium-term financing for permanent working capital to help reduce current idle capacity in the SSE sector; and (iii) continue expanding the Development Fund for SSE's and Artisans (FOPINAR).
